context: Are there super attacks like in infamous
response: Yes, each power set (Smoke, Neon, Video) comes equipped with its own special that can be used after you kill enough people in a short amount of time.

response: I believe it has to say ps4 on the cover, so no.

context: does it work with steam games?
response: Yes, it does. As long as Steam says it has controller support, it will work with the game. Sometimes you may have to map the buttons yourself, though. Don't listen to the guy who said it doesn't.

context: Is there a 2-player mode where my wife and I play on the same screen?
response: Yeah, I play with my friend everyday.even four people can play, 2 on each team.

response: I wanna say no because I believe they made a version for the PlayStation 4.

context: Will this work on mobile phone?
response: Yes it will work. But it depends on the size of the port on your mobile device. The cord that is included with the headset is a 2.5 mm plug in. Most cell phones have a 3.5 mm plug in. I bought a small adapter for it for $5.

context: Does the game install completely on the hard drive or does it need the cd to be in the computer to play the game?
response: It installs completely, then you can put the CD away and not use it while you play.

context: does this work with mac
response: Yes, but for mac's I'd advise getting the magic mouse or touch pad.... Bc you get more functionality

context: Does this have the most recent update? And did they fix all of the earlier batch problems?
response: As Thomas said, you'll still have to plug the wheel into a PC to update the firmware, but all the problems have been fixed and works amazingly on the XB1 or PC :)

context: Would this fit a Vita slim?
response: Really can't say since the vita slim is not out for sale in the north America yet. Im sure they will be making one soon for it. But I wouldn't take my chance on it.

context: I have read lots of complaints about people receiving the wrong model for their vita. I have the original vita, will this grip work for that model?
response: There is currently only the one model of Vita in the US. The slim has not released yet as far as I know. The charging attachment actually slides up into the Vita and then you move a switch to lock it into place holding the Vita firmly.

context: Hard Disk  500
response: If I understand your question, the PS4 comes with a standard 500 GB hard drive.  It can be upgraded to one with higher capacity.  I believe that most available drives are compatible, however I recommend you check with Sony for a list of compatible hard drives.

context: Does this game will come with a game code for one of four other games (New Super Mario Bros. U, The Wind Waker HD, Pikmin 3)? I read that elsewhere
response: Yes. You register your copy of Mario Kart 8 with Club Nintendo before July 31 to get the download. The registration code is inside the game case.

context: We just ordered the Wii U... what extra controllers will we need for multiplayer use?
